pageContent.title: Cover Your Bases
pageContent.descriptionText: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Cover Your Bases</Introtext><welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:12pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:normal; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">“Closing the new sale now might be successful in the short term, but it could actually lengthen the prescribing cycle later and cause mistrust. You should first make sure that you explore concerns about the risks of continuing therapy in the outpatient setting before moving ahead.”</welcomeText>
